name: openFinclaw DataHub
description: Financial data bridge to Tushare proxy â€” A-shares, HK stocks, US equities, Macro, Derivatives, Crypto. Set TUSHARE_PROXY_API_KEY for real-time data.

tushareApiKey.description: API key for Tushare proxy (X-Api-Key header)

mode.description: live = real data via Tushare proxy; stub = sample data for testing

tushareProxyUrl.label: Tushare Proxy URL
tushareProxyUrl.help: Base URL for the Tushare proxy server. Default works out-of-the-box.

tushareApiKey.label: Tushare API Key
tushareApiKey.help: API key for the Tushare proxy. Also readable from TUSHARE_PROXY_API_KEY env var.

mode.label: Mode
mode.help: live = real financial data via Tushare proxy; stub = offline sample data for development

requestTimeoutMs.label: Request Timeout (ms)
requestTimeoutMs.help: Timeout for each API request (default 30s, max 120s)
